item.title: ssh
item.description: #ssh 1 2 3 4 5 WARNING: UNPROTECTED PRIVATE KEY FILE! Permissions 0777 for '/root/.ssh/id_rsa' are too open. It is recommended that your private key files are NOT accessible by others.
